report.title: EBMS Sites Download Report 2
report.description: Lists saved sites and their attributes with filtering to integrate with new downloads page on ABLE.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.website_id IN (#website_ids#) JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt ON ctt.id=l.location_type_id #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false #filters# #order_by#

param.name: cms_attribute_id
param.description: Attribute used to hold the CMS User ID
param.where: EXISTS (SELECT id FROM location_attribute_values lav WHERE lav.location_id = l.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #cms_attribute_id# AND lav.int_value = #cms_user_id# AND lav.deleted=false)

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: indexed_location_list_context
param.join: JOIN location lcontext on st_intersects(lcontext.boundary_geom, l.boundary_geom) AND lcontext.id IN (#indexed_location_list_context#)
